wordpressPage.title: The Ice Melter
wordpressPage.content:
Equipment Needed: Ice Cubes & Paper/Plastic Cups

Rather than breaking the ice in this game we melt it!

Hand each member an ice cube and a cup explaining to them that the aim of the game is to see who can melt their ice cube the most in 2 minutes.

Inform the group that they can only use their hands to melt the cube into their cup, they cannot use their clothing or blow it.

After the game to decide who’s won measure how much water is in each cup. This is a great game to see how long it is since a young person has washed their hands as the water goes some interesting colours!
